---------------------------------------------
R4 TEST 



2^ 6 + 2^ 2 = 68 = 0x44


00101 - RS2 
R5 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index 0 - 000
LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index 2 - 010
LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index 4 - 100
LI R5 with 0000000000000100 at index 6 - 110



00001 - RS1
R1 gets 2^ in its slices.

LI R1 with 0000000001000000 at index  0 - 000
LI R1 with 0000000001000000 at index  2 - 010
LI R1 with 0000000001000000 at index  4 - 100
LI R1 with 0000000001000000 at index  6 - 110

 
00000
R0 gets result.

Opcode
1100000010001010000100000 


program:

0000000000000000010000101  
0010000000000000010000101 
0100000000000000010000101  
0110000000000000010000101 
0000000000000100000000001  
0010000000000100000000001 
0100000000000100000000001 
0110000000000100000000001  
1100000010001010000100000 


passes.

---------------------------------------------------
